answers.answer: a high reading means your blood sugar is 500 or above as meters only register up to 499.you have to adjust your diet so your after meal numbers are not so high.talk to your doctor he can help you with your questions.

question: If my meter has been giving me a reading of high for two days and taking insulin hasn't significantly lowered it what should I do? I've only had diabetes for about two months.
title: High blood sugar for two days
